Docs.summary: Provides services for XAML serialization by XAML designers or other callers that require advanced serialization.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The XamlDesignerSerializationManager attempts to optimize access to services that are called frequently during the serialization process.
A XamlDesignerSerializationManager is also used as an input for certain specialized `ShouldSerialize` methods on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] classes such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.ShouldSerializeInlines%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and for an overload of <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlWriter.Save%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
